alert.note: Alert for Fillmore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Fillmore County through 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Preston, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Preston around 455 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Granger, Forestville State Park, Carimona, York, Bristol, Cherry Grove, Hutton and Greenleafton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Iowa.
